message.content:
I need to identify the cash and cash equivalents at the end of the period from the cash flow statement.

Looking at the cash flow statement in the problem, I can see the "Cash and Cash Equivalents" section with three line items:
- Beginning Balance: 8000000.00
- Ending Balance: 7349369.78
- Net Increase: -650630.22

The specific line item I need is "Ending Balance" which represents the cash and cash equivalents at the end of the period. The value is 7349369.78.

```json
{"solution": {'value': '7349369.78'}}
```
